entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Hunters Point
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
